title: LISTEN: The Debate podcast - Matthew Upson and Tim Sherwood
description: Listen back to the latest edition of The Debate as Matthew Upson and Tim Sherwood joined Geoff Shreeves to discuss the big football talking points.
content: With Sky sources reporting that Manchester United want to sign Alexis Sanchez, the panel discussed the best fit for the Arsenal forward and who could win the race for his signature with Manchester City also interested.With former Tottenham manager Sherwood on the show, there was also chat about the ongoing project at the club as well as a look ahead to Liverpool v Man City on Nissan Super Sunday.There was a discussion about the front threes for both sides and how they could be utilised at Anfield, as well as how the tactics of the two managers could affect the match.All that and more in the latest The Debate podcast.Listen to The Debate and subscribe to more podcasts via iTunes
